content:
As an AI language model, being impartial is essential, but I can provide some information on every festival mentioned above:

1. Leuven Jazz Festival – If you enjoy jazz music, this is the festival for you. With a lineup featuring a wide range of jazz artists, you can enjoy this international genre with other jazz enthusiasts from around the world.

2. Wereldfeest – This festival is the most significant multicultural celebration in Leuven. You can experience a range of cultural performances and cuisines from different parts of the world while learning about different cultures.

3. Holi Fusion Festival – If you are a fan of vibrant colors and sounds of traditional Indian music, this festival is perfect for you. You can participate in the festival of colors at this exciting international event.

4. Leuven African Festival – This festival is the place to be if you want to experience African rhythms, dance, and foods. 

5. Leuven Beer Fest - If you love beer and want to experience different flavors and varieties of Belgian beer, this festival is for you.

Each festival has its unique charm and offers an outstanding opportunity to experience different cultures. So, it entirely depends on your preference and tastes.
